name: Blogging platform
description: A blogging website that allows users to sign up with just a username and password. Once registered, users can create new posts with a title, content, image, and tags. The homepage features a search bar that supports fuzzy search for blog titles and content, as well as a tag list for filtering blogs.

name: aaronhong.net
description: A portfolio website with four sections: Home, About, Projects, and Contact. It supports three languages: English, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese. Additionally, the website features both dark and light themes.
